title: Information Design-Based Learning Experience Design: Mobile Microlearning for Pre-Service/In-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Application of information design principles specialized for language education, considering smartphone-centric limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design secondary language learning materials using information structuring techniques (text/image layering, visual hierarchy setting).
Learners can produce mobile-optimized learning content by applying multimodality principles (text, audio, simple visuals).
Learners can develop applicable information design learning modules (5-minute microlearning) for real classroom settings through project-based assessment tasks.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
